只不過.definition: only; merely; nothing but; no more than; it's just that ...

只可意會，不可言傳.pinyin: zhi3 ke3 yi4 hui4 , bu4 ke3 yan2 chuan2
只可意會，不可言傳.definition: can be understood, but not described (idiom, from Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子[Zhuang1 zi3]); mysterious and subtle

只好.definition: to have no other option but to ...; to have to; to be forced to

只得.definition: to have no alternative but to; to be obliged to

只怕.definition: I'm afraid that...; perhaps; maybe; very likely

只是.definition: merely; only; just; nothing but; simply; but; however

只有.definition: only have ...; there is only ...; (used in combination with 才[cai2]) it is only if one ... (that one can ...) (Example: 只有通過治療才能痊愈|只有通过治疗才能痊愈[zhi3 you3 tong1 guo4 zhi4 liao2 cai2 neng2 quan2 yu4] "the only way to cure it is with therapy"); it is only ... (who ...) (Example: 只有男性才有此需要[zhi3 you3 nan2 xing4 cai2 you3 ci3 xu1 yao4] "only men would have such a requirement"); (used to indicate that one has no alternative) one can only (do a certain thing) (Example: 只有屈服[zhi3 you3 qu1 fu2] "the only thing you can do is give in")

只欠東風.definition: all we need is an east wind (idiom); lacking only one tiny crucial item

只消.definition: to only need; it only takes

只爭旦夕.definition: see 只爭朝夕|只争朝夕[zhi3 zheng1 zhao1 xi1]

只爭朝夕.definition: (idiom) to seize every minute; to make the best use of one's time

只知其一，不知其二.pinyin: zhi3 zhi1 qi2 yi1 , bu4 zhi1 qi2 er4
只知其一，不知其二.definition: to know the first, but not know the second (idiom); only partial information

只管.definition: solely engrossed in one thing; just (one thing, no need to worry about the rest); simply; by all means; please feel free; do not hesitate (to ask for sth)

只能.definition: can only; obliged to do sth; to have no other choice

只要功夫深，鐵杵磨成針.pinyin: zhi3 yao4 gong1 fu5 shen1 , tie3 chu3 mo2 cheng2 zhen1
只要功夫深，鐵杵磨成針.definition: If you work at it hard enough, you can grind an iron bar into a needle.; cf idiom 磨杵成針|磨杵成针, to grind an iron bar down to a fine needle (idiom); fig. to persevere in a difficult task; to study diligently

只見.definition: to see (the same thing) over and over again; to see, to one's surprise, (sth happen suddenly)

只見樹木，不見森林.pinyin: zhi3 jian4 - shu4 mu4 , bu4 jian4 - sen1 lin2
只見樹木，不見森林.definition: can't see the wood for the trees

只言片語.definition: (idiom) just a word or two; a few isolated phrases

只許州官放火，不許百姓點燈.pinyin: zhi3 xu3 zhou1 guan1 fang4 huo3 , bu4 xu3 bai3 xing4 dian3 deng1
只許州官放火，不許百姓點燈.definition: only the official is allowed to light the fire; Gods may do what cattle may not; quod licet Iovi, non licet bovi

只說不做.definition: to be all talk and no action

只顧.definition: to focus solely on; to pay attention only to; to be preoccupied with
